name: Pulse Cannon
description: A large cannon that fires a tetryon pulse.

name: Disruptor
description: A powerful weapon capable of destroying hulls.

name: Assault Rifle
description: A rifle capable of automatic fire.

name: Moonlight Greatsword
description: A legendary sword. Its massive blade can fire waves of moonlight.

name: Bat'leth
description: A long curved blade with several handles. favored by warriors.

name: Anduril
description: A lost sword of legend. Reforged and made whole.

name: Tonitrus
description: A mace with a dynamo inside. swings produce powerful lightning strikes.

name: Flamethrower
description: A device that drowns enemies in flames.

name: Powergloves
description: heavy gauntlets for pummeling your enemies.

name: Crystal Staff
description: A magical staff with a large mass of crystals on the end.

name: Dragonslayer Swordspear
description: A massive swordspear imbued with lightning. Designed to kill dragons.
